game.name: Indian Uphill Bus Simulator 3D
game.description:
Hey friends! Have you ever dreamt of riding a bus in a realistic environment? Luckily, we have got you covered with a brand new racing game where you will get a chance to navigate multiple bus models on the hill roads. Does not it sound pretty challenging? Join Indian Uphill Bus Simulator 3D without wasting your precious time and be prepared to enjoy a matchless bus riding experience in a gorgeous hill station! Hurry up! Passengers are waiting for you eagerly!

Grab your seat on a nice bus and try not to disturb your balance and speed through the curvy paths and treacherous turns in this one of the best bus driving games for boys! These kinds of obstacles could slow down the speed of your bus. Pick up the passengers from the bus stop and drop them at the designated bus stops timely! Do not get consumed by the complications available in the terrains. Make sure to complete the mission as fast as you can in the bus simulator.

Select free mode or career mode to play through first in this 3D realistic uphill challenge! In each model, you would have 12 unique and addictive levels to enjoy. You can unlock the advanced level only when you clear the present one. When you complete the level, the screen will show you how many passengers have used your bus, how much time your bus has taken to complete your ride, how much cash you have earned, comfort of passengers and time bonus. Click the next button then to move to the advanced level in this HTML5 bus driving game!
